result.html: An bhfuil ocras ortAre you hungry?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil ocras ortAre you hungry?

result.html: Tá ocras ormI am hungry.
result.ponchtml: Tá ocras ormI am hungry.

result.html: An bhfuil ocras ortAre you hungry?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil ocras ortAre you hungry?

result.html: Tá ocras orm a MhamaI am hungry, Mommy!
result.ponchtml: Tá ocras orm a ṀamaI am hungry, Mommy!

result.html: Cuimhnígí ar na leanaí ocrachaThink of the hungry children.
result.ponchtml: Cuiṁnígí ar na leanaí ocraċaThink of the hungry children.

result.eng: Before them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ga: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.orig: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.html: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ponchtml: Baile beag suaraċ ocraċ beadaí a ḃí amaċ rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
